fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check a player to see if they were your murderer. If they are, attack the player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, two players will have been assigned to be your murderer, but you will only know their roles.
- Once you kill both of these players, you may attack twice per night and you are able to kill anyone.
